title: Change Homeowners Insurance Coverage Limits
description: A customer finished their basement and wants to increase their personal property coverage limit.

tasks.description: Identify the policyholder and their current coverage limits.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the customer's policy and notes their current coverage.

tasks.description: Discuss the new desired coverage amount with the customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent and customer determine an appropriate new coverage limit.

tasks.description: Update the policy with the new coverage limit and calculate the resulting premium change.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully increases the coverage and informs the customer of the new premium.
